Creating a version tag

Creating a version tag from an environment will bundle all forms, resources, roles, actions and access into a setting and store them with the associated version tag.

This version tag can then be deployed into another environment which will overwrite the project there.

To create a new version tag, enter a version tag into the version tag field and click Create version tag.
